alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:27PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Umatilla County through 700 PM PDT... At 626 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Rieth, or 10 miles southwest of Pendleton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pendleton, Rieth and western Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
